title: France arrests nine over far-right activist’s killing
summary_full: Quentin Deranque, 23, died after sustaining a severe brain injury when he was attacked last week on the sidelines of a far-right protest
summary_public: Quentin Deranque, 23, died after sustaining a severe brain injury when he was attacked last week on the sidelines of a far-right protest

FR.label: positive
